title: Campus Crest Enters Into Definitive Agreements for Sale totaling $7.03 per share (Campus Crest Communities ...
text: ( Source : Campus Crest Communities Inc) CHARLOTTE , N.C. , Oct. 16, 2015 / PRNewswire / -- Campus Crest Communities, Inc. ( NYSE : CCG ) (the ' Company ' or 'Campus Crest '), today announced that it has entered into a definitive merger agreement with
